ne13:1.3_0: Yathā ekaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ aññamaññehi vevacanehi niddisati.
ne13:3.1_0: Āsā nāma vuccati yā bhavissassa atthassa āsīsanā avassaṁ āgamissatīti āsāssa uppajjati.
ne13:3.2_0: Pihā nāma yā vattamānassa atthassa patthanā,
ne13:3.2_1: seyyataraṁ vā disvā “ediso bhaveyyan”ti pihāssa uppajjati.
ne13:5.1_0: Sarāti keci rūpādhimuttā keci saddādhimuttā keci gandhādhimuttā keci rasādhimuttā keci phoṭṭhabbādhimuttā keci dhammādhimuttā.
ne13:5.2_0: Tattha yāni cha gehasitāni domanassāni yāni ca cha gehasitāni somanassāni yāni ca cha nekkhammasitāni
ne13:5.2_1: domanassāni yāni ca cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni,
ne13:5.3_0: Yā cha upekkhā gehasitā, ayaṁ diṭṭhipakkho.
ne13:6.1_0: Sāyeva patthanākārena dhammanandī dhammapemaṁ dhammajjhosānanti taṇhāya etaṁ vevacanaṁ.
ne13:6.2_0: Cittaṁ mano viññāṇanti cittassa etaṁ vevacanaṁ.
ne13:6.3_0: Manindriyaṁ manodhātu manāyatanaṁ vijānanāti manassetaṁ vevacanaṁ.
ne13:6.4_0: Paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ adhipaññā sikkhā paññā paññākkhandho dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo ñāṇaṁ sammādiṭṭhi
ne13:6.4_1: tīraṇā vipassanā dhamme ñāṇaṁ atthe ñāṇaṁ anvaye ñāṇaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ anuppāde ñāṇaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ
ne13:6.4_2: aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ cakkhu vijjā buddhi bhūri medhā āloko,
ne13:6.4_3: yaṁ vā pana yaṁ kiñci aññampi evaṁ jātiyaṁ,
ne13:7.1_0: Yathā ca buddhānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū
ne13:7.1_1: anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
ne13:7.2_0: Balanipphattigato vesārajjappatto adhigatappaṭisambhido catuyogavippahīno agatigamanavītivatto uddhaṭasallo
ne13:7.2_1: nirūḷhavaṇo madditakaṇḍako nibbāpitapariyuṭṭhāno bandhanātīto ganthaviniveṭhano ajjhāsayavītivatto bhinnandhakāro
ne13:7.2_2: cakkhumā lokadhammasamatikkanto anurodhavirodhavippayutto iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu dhammesu asaṅkhepagato bandhanātivatto
ne13:7.2_3: ṭhapitasaṅgāmo abhikkantataro ukkādharo ālokakaro pajjotakaro tamonudo raṇañjaho aparimāṇavaṇṇo appameyyavaṇṇo
ne13:7.2_4: asaṅkheyyavaṇṇo ābhaṅkaro pabhaṅkaro dhammobhāsapajjotakaroti ca buddhā bhagavantoti ca buddhānussatiyā
ne13:8.1_0: Yathā ca dhammānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhi.
ne13:8.2_0: Yadidaṁ madanimmadano pipāsavinayo ālayasamugghāṭo vaṭṭūpacchedo suññato atidullabho taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
ne13:15.1_0: Yathā ca saṅghānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ suppaṭipanno ujuppaṭipanno ñāyappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno yadidaṁ cattāri
ne13:15.1_1: purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo
ne13:15.1_3: sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno vimuttisampanno vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno sattānaṁ sāro sattānaṁ
ne13:15.1_4: maṇḍo sattānaṁ uddhāro sattānaṁ esikā sattānaṁ surabhipasūnaṁ pujjo devānañca manussānañcāti saṅghānussatiyā
ne13:16.1_0: Yathā ca sīlānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni ariyāni ariyakantāni
ne13:16.1_9: sabbabhūmānuparivatti ca sīlaṁ amatapariyosānanti sīlānussatiyā etaṁ vevacanaṁ.
ne13:17.1_0: Yathā ca cāgānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ yasmiṁ samaye ariyasāvako agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato
